- **Archived Outputs Feature Development**: Significant progress on implementing archived outputs functionality for "Endless Mode" (Issue #109), including new API endpoints (list, search, stats, get by ID/observation ID) and standardized error handling.

- **Backend Architecture**: Discovered well-organized modular router architecture with 20+ specialized routers and consistent error handling patterns.
